2.1. Explorers¶

The available explorers are Bitcoin, Bitcoin Testnet and Liquid

class bloxplorer.explorer.BitcoinExplorer¶
static get_address_type(address)¶

Get the Bitcoin address type.

Parameters

address – The alphanumeric Bitcoin

Returns

String representing the address type (P2PKH, P2SH, etc.)

class bloxplorer.explorer.BitcoinTestnetExplorer¶
static get_address_type(address)¶

Get the Bitcoin Testnet address type.

Parameters

address – The alphanumeric Bitcoin

Returns

String representing the address type (P2PKH, P2SH, etc.)

class bloxplorer.explorer.LiquidExplorer¶

Liquid also uses the Issued Assets feature.

Bloxplorer
